title: Share of the population who gave to charity in England 2019 , by age
summary: Body modification , especially tattooing , has proven to be very popular over the last few years . In the united states alone , more than a quarter of the population is adorned with at least 1 tattoo , and less than 40 percent of Americans would rule out getting 1 completely . Most get their first in their twenties , and the vast majority never regrets that first prick of the needle .
gold: This statistic shows the share of the population who said they gave to charity in the last four weeks in 2018/19 , by age group . Proportionally , those aged 75 and more gave most to charity . At 59 percent , 16 to 24 year olds had the smallest proportion of charitable givers .
